title: United States defined
context: ยง431:1-214 United States defined. United States, when used to signify a place, means the states of the United States and the governments of Puerto Rico, American Samoa, Guam, the Northern Mariana Islands, the United States Virgin Islands, and the District of Columbia. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2; am L 1997, c 233, ยง3; am L 2011, c 68, ยง3]
